title: Timed media quality of experience
description: Timed media properties related to the content playback's quality of experience (QoE).

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: The number of errors that were encountered during playback.

buffers.title: Buffer events
buffers.description: The number of buffer states that occurred during a playback session.

bufferTime.title: Total buffer duration
bufferTime.description: Describes the total amount of time in seconds, spent buffering.

bufferImpactedStreams.title: Buffer impacted streams
bufferImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams impacted by buffering.

stalls.title: Stalling events
stalls.description: The number of stall states that occurred during a playback session.

stallTime.title: Total stalling duration
stallTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which the playback was stalled during playback.

stallingImpactedStreams.title: Stalling impacted streams
stallingImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams impacted by stalling.

bitrateChanges.title: Bitrate changes
bitrateChanges.description: The number of bitrate change events that occurred during a playback session.

bitrateAverage.title: Average bitrate
bitrateAverage.description: A weighted average of all bitrate values related to the play duration that occurred during a playback session.

bitrateAverageBucket.title: Average bitrate bucket
bitrateAverageBucket.description: The average bitrate (in kbps). The value is predefined buckets at 100kbps intervals.

bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.title: Bitrate change impacted streams
bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which bitrate changes occurred.

droppedFrames.title: Dropped frames
droppedFrames.description: The number of frames dropped during playback of the main content.

droppedFrameImpactedStreams.title: Dropped frame impacted streams
droppedFrameImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which frames were dropped.

dropBeforeStarts.title: Drops before starts
dropBeforeStarts.description: Indicates the user abandoned the media stream before the first frame for example, during the pre-roll ad break, or due to an error while loading the content from the CDN.

timeToStart.title: Time to start
timeToStart.description: Describes the duration (in seconds) passed between video load and start.

playerSdkErrors.title: Player SDK Error IDs
playerSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Player.

mediaSdkErrors.title: Media SDK Error IDs
mediaSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Media SDK.

externalSdkErrors.title: External Error IDs
externalSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated outside the Player or SDK.

errorImpactedStreams.title: Error impacted streams
errorImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which an error event occurred.
